comments: Boring as hell & the most unhelpful professor I\'ve ever had, ESPECIALLY on tests - don\'t bother asking any question, even if it\'s just for clarification because instead of answering he\'ll just stare at you like a moron. I had him for a 3hr block, which was excruciating. I got an A in the class but it was still an awful experience. Avoid.

Everyone always told me that I would love theories of persuasion, but this teacher is not interesting! His lectures and activities are super boring. If you read the book, you probably don\'t even have to go to class.
